statements: DELETE FROM operational_efficiency_metrics WHERE metric_timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND metric_value > 50;
DELETE FROM operational_efficiency_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Productivity' AND metric_timestamp < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 101 AND department = 'Finance';
